name: podcast-t2
description: Servicio web líder en creación de podcast para Spotify

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && venv\Scripts\python main.py" "cd server && venv/bin/python main.py"
scripts.installOnLinux: npm install && concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && python -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.installOnWindows: npm install && concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt"
